title: Spider (disambiguation)
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Spider (disambiguation)

Spider may refer to:

Certain NPCs
  • Kalrag, a very large and strong spider, blessed with Iban's blood
  • Venenatis spiderling, the boss pet obtained from Venenatis
Certain monsters
  • Spider, an attackable NPC
  • Spider (Ape Atoll), an aggressive, poisonous spider
  • Spider (araxyte), an aggressive, venomous spider
  • Spider (Hallowed Sepulchre), non-attackable spiders found inside the Hallowed Sepulchre
  • Spider (Morytania), non-attackable spiders found in Morytania that summon feral vampyres
  • Spider (Ungael), a spider that can inflict venom
  • Blessed spider, a type of spider found in the Underground Pass
  • Crypt spider, a small but strong spider found in the Barrows
  • Deadly red spider, a red-coloured spider that inhabits the Varrock Sewers and other remote places
  • Fever spider, a Slayer creature requiring 42 Slayer to kill
  • Giant crypt spider, a larger and stronger version of the Crypt Spider
  • Giant spider, a common type of spider found in Lumbridge
  • Huge spider, a spider that can be added to a player-owned house oubliette or Dungeon
  • Ice spider, a strong type of spider found in cold areas
  • Jungle spider, a type of spider found on Karamja and east of Yanille
  • Poison spider, a poisonous type of spider
  • Shadow spider, a spider that drains Prayer
  • Sarachnis, a large spider boss found in the Forthos Dungeon
  • Temple Spider, a high-level spider found in the Forthos Dungeon
  • Venenatis, a large, poisonous spider boss found in the Wilderness
Certain items or objects
  • Red spiders' eggs, an item used in Herblore
  • Spider carcass, the dead body of a jungle spider, used for Cooking
  • Spider on a stick, a dead spider skewered on a stick
  • Spider on shaft, a dead spider skewered on an arrow shaft
  • Spider snack, an item used in the 2020 Halloween event
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Spider''' may refer to:

;Certain NPCs:
*[[Kalrag]], a very large and strong spider, blessed with Iban's blood
*[[Venenatis spiderling]], the boss pet obtained from [[Venenatis]]

;Certain monsters:
*[[Spider]], an attackable NPC
*[[Spider (Ape Atoll)]], an aggressive, poisonous spider
*[[Spider (araxyte)]], an aggressive, venomous spider
*[[Spider (Hallowed Sepulchre)]], non-attackable spiders found inside the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]
*[[Spider (Morytania)]], non-attackable spiders found in [[Morytania]] that summon [[feral vampyre]]s
*[[Spider (Ungael)]], a spider that can inflict venom
*[[Blessed spider]], a type of spider found in the [[Underground Pass (dungeon)|Underground Pass]]
*[[Crypt spider]], a small but strong spider found in the Barrows
*[[Deadly red spider]], a red-coloured spider that inhabits the [[Varrock Sewers]] and other remote places
*[[Fever spider]], a Slayer creature requiring 42 Slayer to kill
*[[Giant crypt spider]], a larger and stronger version of the Crypt Spider
*[[Giant spider]], a common type of spider found in Lumbridge
*[[Huge spider]], a spider that can be added to a [[player-owned house]] [[oubliette]] or [[Dungeon (Construction)|Dungeon]]
*[[Ice spider]], a strong type of spider found in cold areas
*[[Jungle spider]], a type of spider found on Karamja and east of Yanille
*[[Poison spider]], a poisonous type of spider
*[[Shadow spider]], a spider that drains Prayer
*[[Sarachnis]], a large spider boss found in the [[Forthos Dungeon]]
*[[Temple Spider]],  a high-level spider found in the Forthos Dungeon
*[[Venenatis]], a large, poisonous spider boss found in the [[Wilderness]]

;Certain items or objects:
*[[Red spiders' eggs]], an item used in Herblore
*[[Spider carcass]], the dead body of a jungle spider, used for Cooking
*[[Spider on a stick]], a dead spider skewered on a stick
*[[Spider on shaft]], a dead spider skewered on an arrow shaft
*[[Spider snack]], an item used in the [[2020 Halloween event]]

{{disambig}}
